# 神经网络与深度学习讲义（复旦 邱锡鹏）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-jiangyi-fudan-qiuxipeng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-jiangyi-fudan-qiuxipeng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-jiangyi-fudan-qiuxipeng
shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-jiangyi-fudan-qiuxipeng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-jiangyi-fudan-qiuxipeng
shenjingwangluo-yu-shendu-xuexi-jiangyi-fudan-qiuxipeng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
